SELECT rn, board_no, board_group_no, board_tag_name, board_title, board_date, board_hit_count, board_like_count, board_report_count, board_file_check, bgroup_name, member_nick, board_comment_count FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_GROUP_NO ,B.BOARD_TAG_NAME ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_DATE ,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT ,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK ,G.BGROUP_NAME ,M.MEMBER_NICK ,COUNT(C.BOARD_NO) AS board_comment_count
FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN BGROUP G ON B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = G.BOARD_GROUP_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BCOMMENT C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO
WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
WHERE B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = #{board_group_no}
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND REGEXP_LIKE (B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, '^HTML|^JAVA|^CSS|^C|^JS|^SQL|^PYTHON')
AND LOWER(B.BOARD_TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{board_tag_name}||'%'
GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_GROUP_NO, B.BOARD_TAG_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_DATE,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK,G.BGROUP_NAME,M.MEMBER_NICK
ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY board_comment_count DESC
) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT rn, board_no, board_title, board_file_check, member_nick, bcomment_no, bcomment_content, bcomment_date, bcomment_like_count FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (
SELECT B.BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK ,M.MEMBER_NICK ,C.BCOMMENT_NO ,C.BCOMMENT_CONTENT ,C.BCOMMENT_DATE ,C.BCOMMENT_LIKE_COUNT
FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN BCOMMENT C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}

ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC

SELECT C.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_GROUP_NO AS BOARD_GROUP_NO ,B.BOARD_CONTENT AS BOARD_CONTENT ,B.BOARD_TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_DATE AS BOARD_DATE ,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT AS BOARD_HIT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT AS BOARD_LIKE_COUNT ,B.BOARD_TAG_NAME AS BOARD_TAG_NAME ,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK AS BOARD_FILE_CHECK ,M.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK ,M.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO ,COUNT(C.BOARD_NO) AS board_comment_count
FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN BGROUP G ON B.BOARD_GROUP_NO = G.BOARD_GROUP_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BCOMMENT C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
GROUP BY C.BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_GROUP_NO ,B.BOARD_CONTENT ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_DATE ,B.BOARD_HIT_COUNT ,B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT ,B.BOARD_TAG_NAME ,B.BOARD_FILE_CHECK ,M.MEMBER_NICK ,M.MEMBER_NO

SELECT C.BCOMMENT_NO AS BCOMMENT_NO, C.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, M.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK, C.BCOMMENT_DATE AS BCOMMENT_DATE, C.BCOMMENT_CONTENT AS BCOMMENT_CONTENT, C.BCOMMENT_LIKE_COUNT AS BCOMMENT_LIKE_COUNT, C.REF_STEP AS REF_STEP, C.REF_LEVEL AS REF_LEVEL, NVL (F.FILE_NO, 0) AS FILE_NO, F.ORG_FILE_NAME AS ORG_FILE_NAME, F.FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE, F.DEL_GB AS DEL_GB
FROM BCOMMENT C INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BFILE F ON C.BCOMMENT_NO = F.BCOMMENT_NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND C.REF_LEVEL = 0 ORDER BY REF_STEP, REF_LEVEL

SELECT C.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, M.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK, C.BCOMMENT_DATE AS BCOMMENT_DATE, C.BCOMMENT_CONTENT AS BCOMMENT_CONTENT, C.BCOMMENT_LIKE_COUNT AS BCOMMENT_LIKE_COUNT, C.REF_STEP AS REF_STEP, C.REF_LEVEL AS REF_LEVEL FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN BCOMMENT C ON M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO= #{board_no} AND C.REF_LEVEL != 0 ORDER BY REF_STEP, REF_LEVEL
